[docs]def all_users_set() -> str:
    return 'allUsers'




[docs]def user_details_htable(email: str) -> str:
    return f'user:{email}'




[docs]def user_active_api_keys_set(email: str) -> str:
    return f'user:{email}:apikeys'




[docs]def user_revoked_api_keys_set(email: str) -> str:
    return f'user:{email}:revokedApikeys'




[docs]def api_key_to_owner_key(api_key: str) -> str:
    return f'apikey:{api_key}:owner'
